Angular Filter: angular-stringcontains



Regular Angular Filter

<tr ng-repeat="movie in movies | filter:search">


</tr>
Title Genres
{{movie.title}} {{movie.genres}}

All In Filter

<tr ng-repeat="movie in movies | stringContainsAllOf:search:'searchKey'">

</tr>
Title Genres
{{movie.title}} {{movie.genres}}

Any In Filter

<tr ng-repeat="movie in movies | stringContainsAnyOf:search:'searchKey'">

</tr>
Title Genres
{{movie.title}} {{movie.genres}}
